title: The Case of the Red Monkey [1955 - UK] cold war action
description:
The Case of the Red Monkey (1955 - UK)                      aka Little Red Monkey

Action / Adventure / Crime

starring . . . . Richard Conte, Rona Anderson, Russell Napier
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0047924/


Scotland Yard is baffled as a mysterious assassin is targeting eminent British atomic scientists in London. This leads to fears for the safety of Leon Dushenko, a Russian defector and guided-missile expert who is passing through London en route to the United States. Can Special Branch and the US State Department stop Dushenko from becoming the assassin's next victim? The film was made by Anglo-Amalgamated at Merton Park Studios and was an international hit which proved to be a breakthrough for Anglo-Amalgamated. After its success the company began making more expensive productions, often importing American stars to give them more international appeal.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 704x528, 25.000 fps, 1861 Kbps, 01h11m04s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 384 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
